id: The Wall Street JournalOpinionEven the Libertarians Get Luckey Sometimes
paragraph:
November 17, 2018What do you call a Silicon Valley Republican who wants to have friends? A libertarian.Ask virtual-reality pioneer Palmer Luckey. Oculus, the company he founded, was acquired by Facebook in 2014. Last year Facebook fired Mr. Luckey amid fallout from his $10,000 donation to a pro-Trump group founded by internet trolls and extremists.
